td.content: s:pt presents with severe sore that bleeds and oozes and has remained open of 9 days duration together with severe mole that has changed in the color and size, Cancer. he is a 56 year old M massage therapist. he denies smoking he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 170 cm, Weight 72.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed FLUOROURACIL - 5 % TOP topical cream, and ordered Surgical Wide excision - skin, sentinel lymph node biopsy - skin.
